DOC.brief_summary: A study to evaluate the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of Nivolumab in participants with severe sepsis or septic shock.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Nivolumab Safety and Pharmacokinetics in Patients With Severe Sepsis or Septic Shock.
